original_text: The locusts came up over all the land of Egypt and settled on the whole country of Egypt, such a dense swarm of locusts as had never been before, nor ever will be again.
korean_text: 메뚜기가 애굽 온 땅에 이르러 그 사방에 내리매 그 피해가 심하니 이런 메뚜기는 전에도 없었고 후에도 없을 것이라

sentences.original_text: The locusts came up over all the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 메뚜기들이 애굽 온 땅을 뒤덮으며 올라왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and settled on the whole country of Egypt
such a dense swarm of locusts
